title: ICE "compute_type_of_item: unexpected item type"

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

labels.name: T-compiler
labels.description: Relevant to the compiler team, which will review and decide on the PR/issue.

body:
### Code

```Rust
trait Bar {}

trait Foo {
    fn f() {}
}

impl Foo for dyn Bar {}

fn main() {
    Foo::f();
}
```

### Error output

```
error: internal compiler error: compiler/rustc_hir_analysis/src/collect/type_of.rs:363:21: compute_type_of_item: unexpected item type: Trait(No, Normal, Generics { params: [], predicates: [], has_where_clause_predicates: false, where_clause_span: uiq.rs:1:10: 1:10 (#0), span: uiq.rs:1:10: 1:10 (#0) }, [], [])
 --> uiq.rs:1:1
  |
1 | trait Bar {}
  | ^^^^^^^^^^^^
```

```
note: the compiler unexpectedly panicked. this is a bug.

note: we would appreciate a bug report: https://github.com/rust-lang/rust/issues/new?labels=C-bug%2C+I-ICE%2C+T-compiler&template=ice.md

note: rustc 1.67.0-nightly (e75aab045 2022-11-09) running on x86_64-apple-darwin

query stack during panic:
#0 [type_of] computing type of `Bar`
#1 [typeck] type-checking `main`
#2 [typeck_item_bodies] type-checking all item bodies
#3 [analysis] running analysis passes on this crate
end of query stack
error: aborting due to previous error
```

</details>

### Regression

Regression in nightly-2022-10-06, more specifically in rollup dd8c3a80dd2e5a0b62c3ef77511f3296070f78e2.

Likely from #102670, which modified this error message.

<details><summary>Error message prior to the change</summary>

```
error[E0790]: cannot call associated function on trait without specifying the corresponding `impl` type
  --> uiq.rs:10:5
   |
4  |     fn f() {}
   |     --------- `Foo::f` defined here
...
10 |     Foo::f();
   |     ^^^^^^ cannot call associated function of trait
   |
help: use the fully-qualified path to the only available implementation
   |
10 |     <::Bar as Foo>::f();
   |     +++++++++    +

error: aborting due to previous error
```

</details>

### Version

```
rustc 1.67.0-nightly (e75aab045 2022-11-09)
binary: rustc
commit-hash: e75aab045fc476f176a58c408f6b06f0e275c6e1
commit-date: 2022-11-09
host: x86_64-apple-darwin
release: 1.67.0-nightly
LLVM version: 15.0.4
```
